title: DELIVERY_POINT_MISSION
description: The ship without land mission data is acctually the point where the drone will start descending and at the altitude above ground defined on configuration will start ascending back to operational alt and then return home

containerHeight.description: Container height. if not enterd it will be taken from configuration

heightAboveContainerForDrop.description: AV height above Container. if not enterd it will be taken from configuration

deliveryAzimuth.description: If deliveryType is drop, azimuth on delivery

IRLockStartHeight.description: If deliveryType is drop, search heigh for IRLock

dynamicPartAltType.description: If forceByRoute exists - If set to forceByRoute_Alt, the dynamic routes will have the alts of the first and the last points of the static route

staticPartAltType.description: If forceByRoute exists - If isAGL is false, staticPartAltType needs to be set to "manualAlt" in order to allow points in static route to be AGL/ASL
